shortdesc.ph: Used to configure low-light enhancement options.
Used to configure low-light enhancement functionality.

plentry.pd: 0: (Default) Auto mode. The SDK automatically enables or disables low-light enhancement based on ambient lighting to compensate brightness or prevent overexposure.
1: Manual mode. You need to manually enable or disable low-light enhancement.
0: (Default) Prioritize video quality during low-light enhancement. Processes brightness, detail, and noise with moderate performance cost and processing speed. Best overall quality.
1: Prioritize performance during low-light enhancement. Processes brightness and detail with faster processing speed.

Working mode of low-light enhancement.
LOW_LIGHT_ENHANCE_AUTO (0): (Default) Auto mode. The SDK automatically enables or disables low-light enhancement based on ambient lighting.
LOW_LIGHT_ENHANCE_MANUAL (1): Manual mode. You need to manually enable or disable low-light enhancement.

Strength level of low-light enhancement.
LOW_LIGHT_ENHANCE_LEVEL_HIGH_QUALITY (0): (Default) Prioritize video quality during low-light enhancement. Processes brightness, detail, and noise with moderate performance cost and speed. Best overall quality.
LOW_LIGHT_ENHANCE_LEVEL_FAST (1): Prioritize performance. Processes brightness and detail with faster processing speed.
